description: Nikola Petrak secretly meets with trusted Innovator engineers and hands over access credentials for BCI modification, opting for a risky, innovative fix instead of reverting to old protocols.
Innovator engineers start live edits to the BCI overnight. By morning, compliance scores shift unpredictably, triggering confusion in administrative channels about scoring logic.
Residents wake to discover abrupt changes in their BCI scores. Access to jobs, housing, and services is suddenly disrupted, splitting families and communities across new score thresholds.
As once-trusted citizens are misflagged as dissidents, unrest spreads. Grassroots patrols form to help those abruptly cut off by the system; rumors swirl of Council sabotage.
Council crisis deepens as Innovators face accusations of tampering and Directorate leaders demand emergency powers. The Harmonists appeal for calm, but fractures widen throughout the system.
